vega.uplink.pointing

Class PtrSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Product
      • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingBlocksSlice
        • vega.uplink.pointing.PtrSegment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointingBlockSetInterface

    public class PtrSegment
extends PointingBlocksSlice
    Contains the pointing request for a certain MTP period

      • repairSlews

        public void repairSlews()
        Check if there is any gap and fill it with slews. It is recommended to run repairMocm() before to avoid that a slew
        Overrides:
        repairSlews in class PointingBlocksSlice
